when exposed to individual, one-on-one counselling. Group counselling was shown to increase 
EBF during the neonatal period (OR 3.88, CI 2.09–7.22) and at 6 months of age (OR 5.19, CI 
1.90–14.15) compared to control groups. Maternal counselling during pregnancy, immediately 
after childbirth and at key moments in the postnatal period had large and significant effects on 
EBF. Promotion of breastfeeding through mass media was shown effective at increasing EBF
